A4.text: The 45‑letter word pneumono­ultra­microscopic­silico­volcano­coni­osis is the longest English word that appears in a major dictionary.

A5.text: The 28‑letter word Anti­dis­establishment­arian­ism is the longest non‑coined, non‑systematic English word in Oxford Dictionaries.
